Applicant : Grunenfelder, Ashlee
School (district) : Lapwai Middle High School (Lapwai School District)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I have worked in a variety of fields and have experience in managing Restaurants and employees, Wedding/Event Coordination, non-profit fundraising and work, correctional medicine, and counseling.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	*  I teach middle school math and ELA. Historically many of my students who are Nez Perce Tribal members go into fisheries or technical skills careers. I want to give them as many opportunities as possible to experience STEM in many different ways to develop their interests and talents. I want my students to succeed past high school in college or their chosen career and that can be sparked by STEM opporunities.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Hybrid

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* Math
	* Robotics & Coding - Lego Spike Prime & SPHERO Bolt


Instructional Experience:
	* Elementary: 
	* Secondary:  
	* Adult:      

STEM Domain Experience

	* spreadsheet software:        
	* word processing:             
	* presentation software:       
	* project management software: 
	* administrative software:       2083054198
	* public speaking:             

Other interesting experience:

	* Secondary Email : ashlee_grunenfelder@hotmail.com
	* Phone : 2083054198
	* Communication & Availability : Evening
Applicant : Grunenfelder, Ashlee
School (district) : Lapwai Middle High School (Lapwai School District)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	*  I teach middle school math and ELA. Historically many of my students who are Nez Perce Tribal members go into fisheries or technical skills careers. I want to give them as many opportunities as possible to experience STEM in many different ways to develop their interests and talents. I want my students to succeed past high school in college or their chosen career and that can be sparked by STEM opporunities.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Math

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 1
	* 6
	* 7
	* 8
	* K



STEM Domain Experience
	* Math
	* Robotics & Coding - Lego Spike Prime & SPHERO Bolt

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : No
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : No
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I have worked in a variety of fields and have experience in managing Restaurants and employees, Wedding/Event Coordination, non-profit fundraising and work, correctional medicine, and counseling.

LOGISTICS
Residence : Lewiston, ID

Curriculum design : No
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I have worked in a variety of fields and have experience in managing Restaurants and employees, Wedding/Event Coordination, non-profit fundraising and work, correctional medicine, and counseling.

LOGISTICS
Residence : Lewiston, ID
Open to:
	* Hybrid	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : agrunenfelder@lapwai.org
	* Secondary Email : ashlee_grunenfelder@hotmail.com
	* Phone : 2083054198
	* Communication & Availability : Evening
Applicant : Grunenfelder, Ashlee
School (district) : Lapwai Middle High School (Lapwai School District)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	*  I teach middle school math and ELA. Historically many of my students who are Nez Perce Tribal members go into fisheries or technical skills careers. I want to give them as many opportunities as possible to experience STEM in many different ways to develop their interests and talents. I want my students to succeed past high school in college or their chosen career and that can be sparked by STEM opporunities.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Math

EXPERIENCE

	* 1
	* 6
	* 7
	* 8
	* K
